mainText:
A great person is gone, a person that was
the head of a way of being is gone. Apple has changed the way I view PC's,
its OS has made me think that a perfect thing is possible, I love it. Steve
with all the Apple staff changed the world, you guys even have an episode in
The Simpsons.

I want to express my condolences for the loss of a great person and hope its
legacy and actions keep in our minds for a long time.

Thanks for everything! And Condolences from Colombia.
author: Erik
